name: morphir-service
description: Morphir support for distributed service modeling

scripts.make-cli: cd cli && elm make src/Morphir/Elm/CLI.elm --output Morphir.Elm.CLI.js --optimize
scripts.make-cli-dev: cd cli && elm make src/Morphir/Elm/CLI.elm --output Morphir.Elm.CLI.js
scripts.cli: npm run clean && ncc build cli/morphir-service.js -o dist/morphir
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run make-cli && ncc build cli/morphir-service.js -o dist/morphir

author: MorganStanley
